frontmatter.lodges:
Vumbura Plains
Zarafa Camp
Thorntree River Lodge

pageProps.content:
RATE

USD 12,000 + per person

AREAS

Botswana, Vic Falls (9 nights)

Trip Summary

  • 3 nights: Vumbura Plains, Okavango Delta – Botswana
  • 3 nights: Zarafa Camp, Selinda – Botswana
  • 3 nights: Thorntree River Lodge, Livingstone – Zambia

Trip Overview

Day 1:

Upon arrival at Maun International Airport, you will be transferred by light air to Vumbura Plains in the Okavango Delta, Botswana.

Day 1 – 4:

Spend 3 nights at Vumbura Plains in a luxury suite on a fully inclusive basis.

Day 4:

Light air transfer from Vumbura Plains to Zarafa Camp in Selinda, Botswana.

Day 4 - 7:

Spend 3 nights at Zarafa Camp in a luxury tent on a fully inclusive basis.

Day 7:

Light air transfer from Zarafa Camp to Livingstone International Airport, Zambia.

Road transfer from Livingstone International Airport to Thorntree River Lodge in Livingstone, Zambia.

Day 7 - 10:

Spend 3 nights at Thorntree River Lodge in a luxury suite on a fully inclusive basis.

(Activities include game drives in Mosi-oa-Tunya National Park, rhino tracking, bush walks, sunrise & sunset boat cruises, Simonga Village visits, a visit to the Zambian side of the Falls, a visit to the Zimbabwean side of the Falls in low water season (exclude visa fees), a visit to the Livingstone Museum, canoe trips, a visit to Maramba & Makuni Markets & catch & release fishing.)

Day 10:

Road transfer from Thorntree River Lodge to Livingstone International Airport.

Depart Livingstone International Airport as per own arrangements.

End of trip.

Inclusions

  • All light air transfers
  • All road transfers
  • All mentioned accommodations
  • All meals, drinks (soft & alcoholic) & activities

Exclusions

  • International flights
  • Visas (if necessary)
  • Travel Insurance

subfolders.title: VUMBURA PLAINS
subfolders.description:
Vumbura Plains is a premier camp set within a private concession in the extreme northern section of the Okavango Delta.  The concession includes an enormous traversing area of 60,000 hectares, ensuring phenomenal game viewing year-round.

A unique feature at Vumbura Plains is its remote position in a corner of the Okavango Delta.  This position encompasses a wide variety of wildlife that has representatives of just about every animal that occurs in the Okavango biome.
This is Botswana luxury at its finest.

Vumbura Plains offers a high-end luxury safari experience like no other.  The camp comprises two separate 6-roomed camps – Vumbura North & Vumbura South, each with a private dining, lounge & bar area overlooking the magnificent vistas of the Okavango Delta.
Each spacious suite is raised off the ground on wooden decks & comprises an en-suite bedroom with a lounge as well as an outdoor shower with wonderful views over the floodplains.  Each suite also has a private plunge pool & sala where guests can relax or read while sipping a cocktail.
There are also 2 family tents at Vumbura North, comprising 2 en-suite bedrooms.
The main area boasts a star-gazing deck & campfire, the ideal place to relax after a day out in the bush.

subfolders.title: ZARAFA CAMP
subfolders.description:
Zarafa Camp overlooks the magnificent Zibadianja Lagoon – the source of the world-famous Savute Channel.
The Selinda Reserve is famous for its massive herds of elephants & large populations of predators, such as lion, leopard, cheetah & wild dog.   Abundant plains game can also be found here, including kudu, buffalo, zebra & giraffe.

Zarafa Camp consists of only 4 luxuriously appointed safari tents.  Hosting a maximum of 8 guests, the emphasis at Zarafa Camp is on offering guests a private or exclusive safari experience.  
Each tent has a private veranda, positioned under shady trees with breathtaking views of the Zibadianja Lagoon.  The bedrooms are large & have en-suite bathrooms, featuring a copper bath as well as indoor & outdoor showers.

Zarafa Camp is furnished in 20th-century décor & finishes.  The main area consists of a lounge & dining area – both set under canvas as well as a large viewing deck shaded by giant trees.

subfolders.title: THORNTREE RIVER LODGE
subfolders.description:
Thorntree River Lodge, one of Zambia’s most contemporary lodges boasts a spectacular setting on the legendary Zambezi River, just upstream from Zambia’s biggest drawcard:  the mighty Victoria Falls.
Thorntree has an eco-concious design that incorporates nature & 21-century living.  
With a superb location, guests have easy access to the Falls & all the fun-filled activities it has to offer, while allowing peace & tranquility in a pristine riverfront setting.

Small & intimate, with only 8 suites & 2 family suites, Thorntree River Lodge gives guests a boutique experience on the river’s edge.
Each suite has an indoor & outdoor en-suite bathroom & a private plunge pool with spectacular river views.
The 2 family units have inter-leading walkways between the 2 bedrooms, which are both en-suite.  Each unit has its own indoor & outdoor bathroom as well as luxurious plunge pool. 
Thorntree’s central area comprises a temperature-controlled wine cellar, gym, spa, dining room, lounge & swimming pool.

Their private boat is ideal for romantic sunset river cruises down the Zambezi & guests have the choice of swimming in the communal infinity pool or even better – their own private plunge pool.
Guests can also use the gym or book relaxing treatments at the spa.  Children can join the Ngwana Kids Club to learn more about nature during their time at Thorntree.
Activities at Victoria Falls include elephant interactions, microlight flights over the Falls, river rafting, canoe safaris on the mighty Zambezi River, day trips to Livingstone Island, swimming at Devil’s Pool & much more.

whatWeLoveItems: Experience Botswana & Vic Falls’ premier lodges
Stay in luxury – spacious suites, private pools & outdoor showers
Encounter Africa’s predators during day & night drives
Enjoy river views & romantic sunset boat cruises
Swim at the edge of the Falls – season dependent
